孞字的基本解释

孞
xìn
古同“信”。

孞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xìn］
［《廣韻》息晉切，去震，心。］
亦作“孞1”。
(1)诚实不欺。
(2)守信用，实践诺言。
(3)果真，确实。
(4)不发生差误；有规律。
(5)表明；明确。
(6)信从，相信。
(7)知道；料到。
(8)任意；听任。
(9)符契，凭证。
(10)使者；传送公文函件的人。
(11)书信。
(12)消息，音讯。
(13)谓连宿两夜。语出《诗·周颂·有客》：“有客宿宿，有客信信。”毛传：“一宿曰宿，再宿曰信。”
(14)引申谓两天。
(15)即信石。指砒霜。为剧毒药物。
(16)装在器物中心的物件。如蜡烛的捻子、爆竹的引线等。
(17)姓。
[②]［shēn］
［《集韻》升人切，平真，書。］
亦作“孞2”。
(1)通“伸”。伸直，伸长。
(2)通“伸”。伸张。
(3)通“身”。见“信2圭”。

孞字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【寅集】【子字部】　孞； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页278第15
【搜真玉鏡】音信。

孞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
孞字的起名意思

暂无。

Ya
Basic explanation of words
Ya
xìn
Gu Tong "faith".
Ya
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xìn］
["Guangyun" Xi Jinqie, to shake, heart. ]
Also known as "Ya 1".
(1) Being honest and not deceiving.
(2) Keeping promises and fulfilling promises.
(3) Really, indeed.
(4) No errors occur; there are rules.
(5) Demonstrate; be clear.
(6) Follow and believe.
(7) Know; expected.
(8) Any; leave it alone.
(9) Deed and certificate.
(10) Messenger; a person who sends official documents.
(11) Letters.
(12) News, audio.
(13) It means two consecutive nights. The words "Poetry·Song of Zhou·A Guest": "There are guests who stay in the hotel, and there are guests who believe in the letter." Mao Chuan: "One night is called a stay, and then a stay is called a letter."
(14) By extension, two days.
(15) The letter stone. Refers to arsenic. For highly toxic drugs.
(16) The object installed in the center of the utensil. Such as the twist of candles, the lead of firecrackers, etc.
(17) Last name.
[②] [shēn]
["Ji Yun" ascend to cut, plain, book. ]
Also known as "Ya 2".
(1) Through "stretching". Straighten and extend.
(2) Through "stretching". Stretch.
(3) Through the "body". See "Letter 2 Gui".
Ya
